revised_title: Intensity Measurements in Lithium Band Spectrum and Isotopic Ratio
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the intensity ratios of lithium's band spectrum and determined the isotopic ratio of lithium-6 to lithium-7. The results showed that the intensity ratio of the strong to weak rotational lines in the bands 4900 Å, 4838 Å, and 6554 Å was 1.63. The optical determination of the relative abundance of isotopes found a ratio of lithium-6 to lithium-7 that was not in agreement with the ratio calculated from the atomic weight.
